td.content: s:a 29 YO white male presents w/ c/o 3 days h/o Kidney. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 2 years in his past denies any smoking o:Height 174 cm, Weight 86.1 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urine culture.

s:a white M aged 29 ys presents with Kidney. he is having symptoms 9-10 times a week, in spite of treatment. he denies ever using cigarettes he consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 174 cm, Weight 85.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 66, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urine culture.
